name: Add Google Sheets rows for New Recruitee Candidates
description: Every time a new Recruitee candidate is added, Make will automatically add a new row to a Google Sheet. This example uses [this sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GET9kh3A80FMtB4tknAxOClIWJLWDjz3ZGKt-DI2X-E/edit#gid=0).
